snippet: Aircraft bombed caves in the Mount Chaambi area, where the military has been trying to track down a band of 15 to 20 Islamist militants since December, an army spokesman said Friday.
abstract: Tunisian forces launch air and ground strikes on Islamist militants near border with Algeria after fierce clashes in area.
lead_paragraph: Aircraft bombed caves in the Mount Chaambi area, where the military has been trying to track down a band of 15 to 20 Islamist militants since December, an army spokesman said Friday.

headline.main: Tunisia: Military Hunts Militants Near Algerian Border
headline.print_headline: Tunisia: Military Hunts Militants Near Algerian Border
